Context: The Indigenous student centres at George Brown College are located at three different campuses: Sahkitcheway at St. James campus (Room 562D, 200 King St E, Toronto, Ontario), Wichihitowin at Casa Loma campus (Room 434C, 160 Kendal Ave. Toronto, Ontario), and Jiigibiik nibwaakaawin teg at Waterfront campus (Room 2275, 1 Dockside Dr. Toronto, Ontario). These centres offer students a quiet and comfortable place to study, access to job postings, current event listings, community newsletters, and college and university information. Students can also meet other students, have access to free coffee, and learn more about the Indigenous Initiatives team and their services. Contact details for the Indigenous Initiatives are: phone number 416-415-2000, TTY 1-877-515-5559, email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The information on this website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
